This mechanism incentives participation for sharing resources by 
granting ﬁxed credits via the Blockchain system. 
4 Main Findings and Perspectives 
This section summarizes this review and gives some perspectives. The proposed solution is based on a reward mechanism secured by the Blockchain. The security of computing resource sharing was addressed in [ 25] by the use 
of Blockchain.

An access control list is associated to each cluster. The security analysis of this approach shows its ability to prevent unveriﬁed nodes from undertaking ofﬂoading. Zouaidi
Blockchain technology was used in [ 23] to achieve the security of cooperative 
computing strategy. To enhance the security level, the fog environment is divided 
into clusters. The simulation results show that the coop-
erative strategy reduces the computing time of a block hash in comparison to the non-cooperative one.

subsection_analysis.section_title: The analysis investigates factors in the academic performance of students included
subsection_analysis.refined_text:
The analysis investigates factors in the academic performance of students included 
in a blended MOOC learning environment were analyzed in this study. Five main research questions were addressed; these relate to different aspects of student perfor-
mance, such as the inﬂuence of age, gender, course selection, computer skills, and workload.

subsection_analysis.section_title: begun to grow, the impact of blended learning that integrates MOOCs on the academic
subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Although blended learning 
with MOOCs is promising to promote engagement, ﬂexibility, and access to educa-tional resources, how such a learning modality inﬂuences academic achievement regarding the student’s role is not clearly understood. begun to grow, the impact of blended learning that integrates MOOCs on the academic 
performance of students remains to be researched [
3, 5]. It thus requires a critical review of how MOOC-
based blended learning affects academic performance.

Abstract Blended learning is the combination of online and classroom instruction. By integrating Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs), students can watch 
lectures from subject matter experts wherever and whenever. 
It has changed the face of traditional education by allowing a custom-ﬁt lesson plan. The main focus of every type of education, whether it is online or traditional learning, examines the 
academic performances of the students.
